channel.title: Removing outdated subclasses
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Removing outdated subclasses" - Discussion on where we draw the line

item.title: Removing outdated subclasses
item.content:encoded:
The wiki recently started collecting old and new versions of the same subclass (see Soulknife for Monk, and 2019/2020 Rogues). The wiki never collected old Unearthed Arcana that have been succeeded by published content (see Sorcerer's Favored Soul UA -> Divine Soul).

Where do we draw the line? Should we remove the old Soulknife subclasses? They've been updated for a reason by the content designers - why keep the old stuff? But if we keep the old stuff, should we keep ALL the old stuff (like Favored Soul)?
